bullet: Can set up, use, and maintain the Redux (Flux) state management architecture for any project with ease
Very familiar with the inner workings of this system and could set it up from scratch if need be
name: Redux
desc: I've built at least one full project using Redux to manage my state, and have otherwise used the reducer pattern in multiple other projects. I am capable of setting up Redux or any similar tool for any project and am completely comfortable with the pattern of how this state management strategy works.
